title: BLACKHAWK S.T.R.I.K.E. Admin/Compass/Flash Pouch with Speed Clips
features: Hook and loop strip for ID patch
Quality tested in the field, made of quality materials
Hook and loop strip for ID patch
Available in ARPAT, Black, Coyote Tan, and Olive Drab
description: The BLACKHAWK! S.T.R.I.K.E. Admin/Compass/Flash Pouch offers a hook and loop strip for ID patch and tough 1000 denier nylon construction. The pouch includes (2) #7 Speed Clips and measures 7w X 7.5h. Available in ARPAT, Black, Coyote Tan, and Olive Drab. The Speed Clip system is the fastest, lightest, and strongest method for mounting tactical gear to S.T.R.I.K.E. platforms. Constructed of a durable yet flexible carbon-fiber polymer blend, BLACKHAWK!'s innovative Speed Clips are the most versatile S.T.R.I.K.E. hardware available. BLACKHAWK! designed these clips in order to eliminate tedious weaving of bulky straps associated with more traditional means of modular attachment. Quickly mount and disconnect gear and rearrange your kit without hesitation.
